The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #19179 ([WIP RFC DONOTMERGE] ci: Run ci configs on cirrus by MarcoFalke)

If you consider this pull request important, p
Do I understand correctly that the last commit fixes _manual_ s390x builds?
It fixes *qemu* builds. Manual and automatic
could you explain why we should remove this? @MarcoFalke

* Running it on travis has been unreliable (search for s390x issues in this repo)\n* travis org is shutting down and there is no s390x on travis com\n* the test is more meaningful if run either locally in qemu or on any other arch that has different endianness
I'd like to keep it so that it can be executed easier, if needed
